China: Rinchinbal's older brother Toghon Temür became emperor of the Yuan dynasty.
India: Prithvi Chand II of the Hindu Katoch kingdom of Kangra defeats the army of Muhammad bin Tughluq who loses nearly all his 10,000 soldiers and is forced to retreat.
Japan: The short-lived Kenmu Restoration starts with the destruction of the Kamakura shogunate in the siege of Kamakura (1333).
Poland:
Death of Władysław I the Elbow-high
Coronation of Casimir III
